Hand of The Day

I intend to post a hand here everyday until the endtimes (I am writing this amid the COVID-19 pandemic, so that may be sooner rather than later). Some hands will highlight strategic aspects that I think are interesting. Some will be hands that I am unsure about. Some will shamelessly plug my training site gambitPLO. Some will be taken from poker forums. Maybe even some high-stakes hands for good fun.

  • Hand of the Day - 2

    26 Mar 2020 | .5/1, 100bb, multiway, river, srp

  • Hand of the Day - 1

    25 Mar 2020 | .5/1, 150bb, hu, river, srp

If you want to read more, check out the archives.
